folder: Richmond Terrace & Bay Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
St. George, Staten Island: Shown is the ferry depot of the St. George-Manhattan ferry and the freight yards of the Baltimore & Ohio Railroad, as seen from Richmond Terrace, north of the vehicular and pedestrian ramp (right) that leads up to the depot from Bay Street.

Views 1, 2: 1924
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Bay Street

title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Bay Street

folder: Bay Street & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Bay Street, south from Richmond
Terrace. On the right is Hyatt Street and the buildings extending south from it are: the Corn Exchang Bank Trust Company, the New York Trust &: Mortgage Company, the Consolidated Edison, and the Title Guarantee & Trust Company. On the left is the wall of the United States
Lighthouse Department.
April 29, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The Corn Exchange Bank and the New York
Trust & Mortgage buildings.
March 26, 1930
P. L. Sperr

title: Richmond: Bay Street - Richmond Terrace

folder: Bay Street & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Bay Street, at its junction with Richmond Terrace, near the entrance to the ferry terminal viaduct, showing the community Christmas tree in front of the Borough Hall.
December 26, 1935
P. L. Sperr
(2) and (3)
The community tree in its full Christmas splendor.
December, 1936
P. L. Sperr
